i live in new york and i love the local shops around here.

participant_2.background:
I am an aspiring male model while my mother looks after my grandmother.
I want to live in a safe neighborhood with good schools, so my daughter and grandchildren can grow up happy and healthy.
I had a quiet Christmas birthday with my family and my boyfriend.
I recall spending long hours in the woods with my dog, chasing rabbits and playing hide-and-seek.
I go hiking in the mountains to clear my head and get some exercise.

content.text: Hi, how is your day going?
Pretty good, my boyfriend and I just got back from a hike in the mountains.
Oh that sounds fun, I love hiking. Where do you go hiking?
We went to a state park about an hour away from here. It was really beautiful.
I love state parks, they're so peaceful. What's your favorite part of hiking?
I love the feeling of being in nature and the exercise. I also like the challenge of getting to the top of a mountain.
I agree, hiking is a great way to get exercise and enjoy the outdoors.
What's your favorite type of hiking?
I like to do day hikes, but I also like to go backpacking sometimes.
I've never gone backpacking, but it sounds fun.
It can be a lot of fun, but it's also a lot of work.
I'm sure it is, but I'd still like to try it sometime.
You should! It's a great experience
